testsuite.name: Scenario: Verify that regrading is disabled for gradable mathapp questions

testcase.name: Then I see the grade details of question "Math App"

testcase.name: And I see that the regrade button for question 1 is disabled
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that regrading is disabled for gradable mathapp questions
